dct_title_s: Geographiæ sacræ ex Veteri et Novo Testamento desumptæ
dct_alternative_sm: Geographiae sacrae ex Veteri et Novo Testamento desumptae tabula prima, quae totius orbis partes continet
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Inset map: Israelitarum mansiones in deserto.
Appears in Sanson's Geographia sacra ... in tabulas duas distincta. Paris : Pierre Mariette, 1662.
